path: To Be Organized/Graphics Documentation/GFX_Information_19/GFX_Information_19/VNC Connections/Interactive/Notes/Digital Interactive/DECIMATOR SETTINGS FOR NUC PC.pdf
text: DECIMATOR SETTINGS FOR NUC SCAN CONVERT 1. Set scaling output format to HD 1080i 59.94 2. Set Control to SDI OUT SOURCE Scaler 3. In the Control menu, scroll to DUC Source and select HDMI IN
